name: Finally
description:
A man feels trapped in his place in humanity. Every day is the same in his little room. 

But he's going to make everyone pay for how he feels. He just has to prepare a few things first.

Then, the world.

Based on the prompt "Final boss, stuck in a loop",  created in 12 hours by a solo dev for Mini Jam 113.

Expected play time: 15 minutes

Controls (Keyboard)
  • Arrow Keys/Num Pad: Select
  • Z/Enter/Spacebar: Confirm
  • X/Esc/0: Menu

Note: you can only open the save menu when on the "another day" screen.

Microsoft® Windows® 7 (32-bit/64-bit) or newer is recommended.

Credits

Made with RPG Maker VX Ace

Additional code: Choice Options by Hime

Music: Phira by HarveyHeartbeat
